fields.title: About Publication Manager
fields.content:
About Publication Manager

Publication Manager aims to be a CMS targeted at media websites.

It is free software. Currently it is published under a simple BSD license. However, we are considering publishing future editions under the GNU Affero General Public License. One of the objectives of the project is to only use free (or open source) software.

Click here to see the Publication Manager license.

Click here to go to Publication Manager's github page.

Credits

This is the current team working on Publication Manager

  • Nathan Geffen

 

Publication Manager is built on top of many free software packages including:

  • Python (of course!)
  • Django
  • JQuery and JQuery UI
  • etc
